code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic ar,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

// Asynchronous reset, positive edge-triggered D flip-flop
always @(posedge clk or posedge ar) begin
    if (ar) begin
        q <= 1'b0;
    end else begin
        q <= d;
    end
end

endmodule
```

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic ar,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

// Asynchronous reset, positive edge-triggered D flip-flop
always @(posedge clk or posedge ar) begin
    if (ar) begin
        q <= 1'b0;
    end else begin
        q <= d;
    end
end

endmodule
```
